text: Hey team, looking to work with Ryan Allen for Pizza Hut. Budget is approx $16,301 - need 2 x Product photography, 1 x Facebook post, 1 x Event photography, 1 x 90-second product demo, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel. 12 weeks exclusivity, 4 month engagement. Usage: 6 months. Start date: October 2025.
